item.title: Getting to the Heart of the Ring Pop
item.description:
The kids were outside playing and I took a few minutes to prep lunch and wash a few dishes.Â As I walked by the back door, I saw my youngest sitting in a box on the deck.
How cute I thought and went to grab the camera. My little man spotted me. I went back to my chores and then noticed he had moved. This time he was on the other side of the door and had set up a barricade with another box.
